author: Luigi Nono
clip_headline: A 5min video solo for Luigi Nono's Al Gran Sole Carico d'Amore. Carina Braunschmidt as the Angel of History. Costume and Makeup Christina Schmitt

author: Elfriede Jelinek
clip_headline: Clip for the band in Stefan Pucher's production of Königsweg by Elfriede Jelinek. Music by Christopher Uhe. Performed by Becky Lee Walters & Réka Csiszér
For the final Scene of Sebastian Baumgarten's Dantons Tod we created a silent which was projected on the Iron Curtain. Live piano accompaniment by Philipp Weiß
For Sebastian Baumgarten's production of Tosca at the Volksbuehne in Berlin we made this short dialogue scene between Kathi Angerer and Lars Rudolph
A short Video Loop made for Detlev Schneider and TESLA in Berlin

How to live in hard times. A look at Begging, Stealing, Squatting, Drinking, and Hunting. Doubleucky's first film project. Commisioned by Theater Bochum for the Detroit Project. Very good fun. 30 min.

author: Dietmar Dath
description: Schaupsielhaus Zürich commission german political essayist and science-fiction author Dietmar Dath to write a new version of frankenstein. The new version included 4 long lyrical monologues taken directly from Mary Shelly's version. The language of the original, lyrical and poetic, suggested a different video style. the fabulous video game designer Victor Morales to created for Frankenstein a series of animations, to reflect this other world.

author: Karlheinz Stockhausen
description: Aus Licht was mamouth Stockhausen project concieved by Pierre Audi. The goal was to stage and perform every opera of the Stockhausen's Aus Licht Cycle. Seven operas, one for each day of the week, all performed in a three day event, staged in an enormous Gas Tank, the Gashouder, in Amsterdam. These operas are almost never done and Audi's desire was to bring them back into the public eye in a truly overwhelming celabratory event.
